title: # Code Snippets `that start with an y` to speed up your Blazor development process
animated_gif: ![Blazory in Action!](images/blazory_in_action.gif "Blazory - Blazor snippets that start with an 'y' - in Action!")
create_issue: You see room for improvement or you have a snippet in mind you want to have included? Feel free to [create an issue](https://github.com/bartvanhoey/Blazory/issues/new), I will see what I can do!
